commitMessage:
@@@GEODE-6143: Remove PowerMock from offheap tests (#6179)

* Clean-up offheap code and tests
* Extract OffHeapClearRequired from OffHeapStoredObject
* Extract ReferenceCounter from OffHeapStoredObject
* Move remaining static methods to bottom of OffHeapStoredObject
* Extract non-static delegate OffHeapRegionEntryHelperInstance from
  OffHeapRegionEntryHelper
* Extract non-static delegate ReferenceCounterInstance from
  ReferenceCounter
* Remove PowerMock from offheap tests
* Remove PowerMock from Geode build files
* Rename OffHeapRegionEntryHelperInstanceTest
* Rename ReferenceCountHelperImplTest
